name: Aether After - Prototype
description:
Choose your weapons and make your way through 7 battle maps, playing in a new style of Tactical Action inspired by the Mega Man Battle Network series. Use your Aether to fire off special attacks and regain it by killing enemies and firing your buster!

Controls:

Arrow Keys:  Movement

Z: Accept / Fire Module

X: Cancel / Fire Buster

A/S: Switch between Modules (Special Weapons)

Please complete survey after playing: https://goo.gl/forms/YyKK3rGrgwcVb94V2
